name: SkateHook - Recycled Skateboard Wall Hook
description:
A cool and very functional wall hook that looks like a skateboard tail and truck! Made from real broken skateboards, the unique scrapes, scars and artwork make every piece one-of-a-kind. Works great as a coat hook or a towel holder. A fun place to hang your gear or bags. The SkateHook can even be used as a charging station for your cell phone or smaller tablet devices!

Very sturdy design. Includes mounting template and standard mounting hardware. Some minor assembly is required. Approx. Size (6"x7.5")

Due to the nature of recycled skateboards, every SkateTruck Wall Hook is unique. We randomly ship a wall hook from our inventory to fill an order unless a special request is made. If you have a color preference, or any other special request, please contact us at the time of order and we will do our best to accommodate.

name: Minideck  #226 - Recycled Skateboard Keychain
description:
Our Minidecks are totally rad keychains made from Recycled Broken Skateboards cut into classic skate deck shapes! The Mini-deck also doubles as an emergency bottle opener for "pop- top" bottles! (Available without bottle opener instructions by request.)

Mini-decks are made from real recycled skateboards, so every one is uniquely awesome. This listing is for Recycled Skateboard Keychain No.226 - "Cruiser" shape as shown in images.

Approx. Size: 3" x 1" x 1/2" with a 1 1/8" keyring

Finished with food safe mineral oil.

Free Shipping if you buy with another item! (You only pay for shipping of first item ordered.)

Want to see more? Visit our Etsy.com Shop here: http://www.etsy.com/shop/deckstool for more recycled skateboard products in stock and ready to roll!

Have any questions? Email us at info@recycledskateboardgifts.com

name: deckstool #417- Recycled Skateboard Stool
description:
This listing is for deckstool #417. You get the exact stool as shown in images.

Broken skateboards are both the inspiration and the raw material for the deckstool - Recycled Skateboard Stool. Incredibly strong and surprisingly comfortable, every deckstool is held together by a skateboard truck. The deckstool is made from real recycled broken skateboards. The scraped and scarred artwork on every stool is unique, yet all deckstools meet our high quality standards and specifications.

The deckstool makes an excellent occasional stool or side table and the compact size makes it especially useful in rooms where floor space is limited.

Seat Height: 18 1/2" (47cm) 
Width: 13 1/2" (34cm) 
Depth: 14" (35cm)

Please contact us for shipping to any international destinations not included.

Want to see more? Visit our Etsy.com Shop here: http://www.etsy.com/shop/deckstool for more recycled skateboard products in stock and ready to roll!

name: Skateboard Magnet Set #212
description:
As functional as they are radical, our new Microdecks are made from real broken skateboards. Every set is unique. Four different precision cut, classic skateboard shapes per set.

Nice, small size. Will not dominate your surface and backed by a high-quality rare earth magnet, Microdecks hold strong. Stick'em on your fridge, whiteboard, or locker.

Free Shipping if you buy with another item! (You only pay for shipping of first item ordered.)

This listing is for Recycled Skateboard Magnet Set No.212 as shown in image. Every set comes bundled in an individual pack as shown.

Set of (4) magnets. Approx. magnet size: 1 1/2" x 1/2" x 1/2"

Finished with food safe mineral oil.

Visit and "Like" our Facebook page for up to date News, Specials, and Sales! http://www.facebook.com/deckstool

Please contact us with any questions! 
info@recycledskateboardgifts.com

name: deckstool #398 - Recycled Skateboard Stool
description:
A cool stool made from real recycled skateboards. Salvaged skate decks are repurposed and joined by a skateboard truck to form the Deckstool. Inspired by skateboarding and designed to take advantage of the way skateboards break, every Deckstool features a unique combination of scarred skateboard artwork.

Incredibly strong and surprisingly comfortable. Great as extra seating for an apartment, bedroom or dorm. Break them out when your friends come over to chill. The compact size makes them especially useful in rooms where floor space is limited. Also excellent as a guitar, drum, or video game stool.

This listing is for deckstool #398. You get the exact stool as shown in images.

Seat Height: 18 1/2" (47cm) 
Width: 13 1/2" (34cm) 
Depth: 14" (35cm)

***International shipping price does not Include any import duties or fees that may apply.***

Please contact us for shipping to any international destinations not included.

Want to see more? Visit our Etsy.com Shop here: http://www.etsy.com/shop/deckstool for more recycled skateboard products in stock and ready to roll!

name: Skatecafe - Recycled Skateboard Dining Tables
description:
Broken skateboards are ripped into planks and then joined in a single layer to create the sleek and colorful table tops of our Skatecafe line. A hidden reinforcement panel underneath strengthens and ensures a flat surface while the chromed-out steel tablebase brings some bling. 

Excellent as a dining table for a small home or apartment. Contract quality. Great in a trendy cafe or yogurt shop. Water-based polyurthethane finish cleans easily with damp cloth. 

Available in dining (29"H) or bar height (42"H). Standard table top sizes are (24" x 24" square) or (30" x 30" square.) Custom tabletop sizes/shapes are available. We guarantee the quality of our products and your satisfaction. 

All Skatecafe Tables are made to order. Due to the nature of the material, broken skateboards, every tabletop is unique and will not look identical to the images shown. We do our best to accomodate special requests for color and board designs. Please allow 2-4 weeks for delivery.

Please contact us for shipping to international destinations.

Have any questions? Email us at info@recycledskateboardgifts.com

options.name: Skatecafe - 24" x 24" Tabletop - Dining Height Base (29"H.)
Skatecafe - 30" x 30" Tabletop - Dining Height Base (29"H.)
Skatecafe - 24" x 24" Tabletop - Bar Height Base (42"H.)
Skatecafe - 30" x 30" Tabletop - Bar Height Base (42"H.)

name: deckbench - 60" Three Seater - Recycled Skateboard Bench
description:
The deckbench is an expertly crafted bench made from 100% reclaimed and recycled broken skateboards. Skateboard trucks attach the legs to the long, popsicle stick-shaped seat and a welded steel frame hidden underneath keeps this baby rock solid, so you can bring a friend...or two.

The deckbench is perfect for your mancave or bedroom. Also works great as a dining bench at an indoor table or as an occasional bench in the mudroom or entranceway. Contract quality. A statement making piece for a business lobby or an informal meeting space. Interior use only.

This listing is for a 60" Three seater deckbench - Recycled Skateboard Bench.

Seat height: 18 1/2" (47cm) 
Width: 60" (153cm) 
Seat Depth: 14 1/2" (37cm) 
Overall Depth: 16 1/2" (42cm)

Water-based polyurethane clearcoat finish. Cleans easily with damp cloth.

We guarantee the quality of our products and your satisfaction. All deckbenches are made to order. Due to the nature of the material, broken skateboards, every deckbench is unique and will not look identical to the images shown. We do our best to accomodate special requests for color and board designs. Please allow 2-4 weeks for delivery.

Please contact us for shipping to international destinations.

Have any questions? Email us at info@recycledskateboardgifts.com
